import React, { Fragment, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Button, Media } from 'reactstrap'; import axios from "axios"; import { MoreVertical, ThumbsUp, UserPlus, MessageSquare } from 'react-feather'; import RightBar from './bars/rightBar.jsx'; import LeftBar from './bars/leftBar.jsx'; import helpers from "./helpers/aboutSectionHelpers/helpers.js"; import PaginationGeneralHelper from "../../../universal/pagination/miscMainPagination.js"; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import NotificationManager from 'react-notifications'; const { renderPicOrVideoProfileOrNotViewed } = helpers; const itemsPerPage = 20; const AboutTab = ({ userData, setPermenantDataState, permenantData, user, isOpen, onCloseModal, onOpenModal, setSelectedCurrently, modalIndexSelected, setSelectedModalIndex }) => { const [ currentPage, setCurrentPage ] = useState(0); const [ itemOffset, setItemOffset ] = useState(0); const [ pageCount, setPageCount ] = useState(0); const [ alreadyViewed, setAlreadyViewedState ] = useState([]); const [ suggestedRandom, setSuggestedRandomHackers ] = useState([]); const history = useHistory(); useEffect(() => { const configgg = { params: {} } axios.post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL}/gather/hackers/random/general`, configgg).then((res) => { if (res.data.message === "Successfully gathered hackers!") { console.log(res.data); const { hackers } = res.data; setSuggestedRandomHackers(hackers); } else { console.log("err", res.data); NotificationManager.error("An unknown error occurred while attempting to fetch this user's data/information...", "Error occurred while fetching user's data!", 4750); } }).catch((err) => { console.log(err); }) }, []) useEffect(() => { const endOffset = itemOffset + itemsPerPage; setPageCount(Math.ceil(permenantData.length / itemsPerPage)); setAlreadyViewedState(permenantData.slice(itemOffset, endOffset)); }, [itemOffset, itemsPerPage]); const redirectToHackerOrEmployerViewed = (accountType, hackerID) => { if (accountType === "hackers") { history.push(`/hacker/profile/individual/view/${hackerID}`); } else { NotificationManager.error("Have not wired up this logic (Employer profile's) yet!!", "NOT WIRED UP YET!", 4500); } } return (
{"People You May Know"}
    {typeof suggestedRandom !== "undefined" && suggestedRandom.length > 0 ? suggestedRandom.map((suggestion, index) => { return (
  • {renderPicOrVideoProfileOrNotViewed(suggestion)} {`${suggestion.firstName} ${suggestion.lastName}`} {typeof suggestion.reviews !== "undefined" && suggestion.reviews.length > 0 ? suggestion.reviews.length : 0}
    • ); }) : null}
{"Hobbies and Interests"}
Hobbies/Interests:

{"I like to ride the bike to work, swimming, and working out. I also like reading design magazines, go to museums, and binge watching a good tv show while it’s raining outside."}

{"Favourite Music Bands / Artists:"}

{"Iron Maid, DC/AC, Megablow, The Ill, Kung Fighters, System of a Revenge."}
{"Favourite TV Shows:"}

{"Breaking Good, RedDevil, People of Interest, The Running Dead, Found, American Guy."}

{"Favourite Books:"}

{"The Crime of the Century, Egiptian Mythology 101, The Scarred Wizard, Lord of the Wings, Amongst Gods, The Oracle, A Tale of Air and Water."}
{"Favourite Movies:"}

{"Idiocratic, The Scarred Wizard and the Fire Crown, Crime Squad Ferrum Man."}

{"Favourite Writers:"}

{"Martin T. Georgeston, Jhonathan R. Token, Ivana Rowle, Alexandr Platt, Marcus Roth."}
{"Favourite Games:"}

{"The First of Us, Assassin’s Squad, Dark Assylum, NMAK16, Last Cause 4, Grand Snatch Auto."}

{"Other Interests:"}

{"Swimming, Surfing, Scuba Diving, Anime, Photography, Tattoos, Street Art."}
{"Education and Employement"}

{"2001 - 2006"}

{"Digital Design Intern"}

{"2006-2008"}

{"Digital Design Intern for the “Multimedz” agency. Was in charge of the communication with the clients."}
{"Rembrandt Institute"}

{"2008"}

{"Five months Digital Illustration course. Professor: Leonardo Stagg."}

{"UI/UX Designer"}

{"2001 - 2006"}

{"Breaking Good, RedDevil, People of Interest, The Running Dead, Found, American Guy."}
{"The Digital College"}

{"2010"}

{"6 months intensive Motion Graphics course. After Effects and Premire. Professor: Donatello Urtle."}

{"The New College of Design"}

{"2008 - 2013"}

{"UI/UX Designer for the “Daydreams” agency."}
{"People Who've Viewed This Profile"}
    {(user !== null && typeof alreadyViewed !== "undefined" && alreadyViewed.length > 0) ? alreadyViewed.map((visit, idx) => { return (
  • {renderPicOrVideoProfileOrNotViewed(visit)} {visit.viewerName} {visit.accountType === "hackers" ? "Hacker Account" : "Employer Account"}
    • ); }) : null}
